prob_inference¶

synopsis:Module for probabilistic inference on a formula_gen.PBModel.
class prob_inference.PBInference(pb_model)[source]¶

Container of inference methods for a formula_gen.PBModel.

backward_plates()[source]¶

Compute backward probabilities for all plates.

Return type:list of els. returned by prob_inference_dev.backward_plate_cy()
